name: Hotel Raito

reviews.text: Hotel Raito-Amalif Coast - LOVED this hotel! Have stayed before in Amalfi however, this town is about 20 minutes away from the crowds which is what we wanted. Spotless hotel on beautiful scenic location overlooking Salerno and Vietri. You Must book a water view room! The hotel is small and intimate with the most wonderful friendly staff..we loved everyone here! In fact we extended out stay. From your balcony we see all the Bay activity and hear church bells and music from the Music Center in the hills....opera, jazz, fabulous!! Hotel offers service locally and drivers are easy to get..ask for Franco to drive you...the hotel knows him or use hotel service for local area. All the food is great in Italy but we loved La Fattoria (up the hills)..a family owned restaurant....we are Italian cooks and loved the food!...
reviews.title: Amalfi Coast-Spotless Hotel!

reviews.text: The area is fairly empty in January. The view is amazing, however there is nothing to do in the area in winter.

We stayed at this hotel for 7 nts. in October, and found it to be a great base for exploring the Amalfi Coast. The hotel has amazing views of the Sea and surrounding coast. There is a nice outdoor pool overlooking the coast as well, although in Oct. it was a little too cool to swim. The lobby area is nice, and includes a small bar and 2 computers to use free of charge. The front desk staff were helpful and spoke English fairly well.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, excellent service

reviews.text: There is a free shuttle into town all day until 6pm.which we utilized a couple of times. Our favorite casual restaurant in Vietri was La Sosta-it was so good we went back twice.Prices are reasonable and food is great.
reviews.title: Highlight of my Honeymoon

description: A recent and precious renovation has turned the famed Hotel Raito, in Vietri sul Mare into a closely guarded secret getaway, the crown jewel of the Amalfi Coast. This extraordinary five star hotel displays a suggestive landscape where Earth, Sea and Sky seem to meet exalting its marvelous position which sets in the mountain-site descending on the amazing Salerno bay. Superb landscapes and a central location give the hotel the most desirable destination.
